audioText: L'équipe de commerce bat positivement les records lors de ce rendez-vous important.
question: What does the commerce team do during this important meeting?
explanation: The text states 'L'équipe de commerce bat positivement les records lors de ce rendez-vous important' - The commerce team positively beats the records during this important meeting. 'Bat' (3rd person singular of 'battre'), 'positivement' (adverb), and 'rendez-vous' (noun) are all priority targets.
